entry.title: Install Wireguard in Ubuntu 23.10
entry.content:
install wireguard

Create server and client at the same time. nano create_wg.py and run it: python3 create_wg.py

Delete server, nano delete_wg.py, and run it : python3 delete_wg.py

entry.title: Configuration of the Rsync Daemon
entry.content:
1 nano /etc/default/rsync

2

3 create file /etc/xinetd.d/rsync (the same as below)

4 create file /etc/rsyncd.conf

5 create file /etc/rsyncd.secrets for password sudo nano /etc/rsyncd.secrets

sudo chmod 600 /etc/rsyncd.secrets

6 restart

7 create password file in client side sudo nano /etc/rsync.secrets

sudo chmod 600 /etc/rsync.secrets

8 have a test in client side

ref
